price: 56. Ir iš tiesų, Mes parodėme jam [Firaunui (Faraonui)] visus Mūsų Ajat (ženklus ir Įkalčius), bet jis neigė ir atsisakė.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
